languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вас сюда послал не иначе как сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} своим провидением! Такая персона, как вы, конечно же не даст свершится чудовищной несправедливости!" {n}Мужчина кривится — кажется, подобострастные речи ему тяжело даются.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вас сюда послал не иначе как сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} своим провидением! Такая персона, как вы, конечно же не даст свершится чудовищной несправедливости!" {n}Мужчина кривится — кажется, подобострастные речи ему тяжело даются.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

languages.text: “大人！一定是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的旨意把你带到了这里！当然了，像你这么伟大的人，绝不会允许这么不公平的事情发生！”{n}这个人脸上的肌肉抽搐着。看起来，他并不怎么习惯于拍人马屁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人！一定是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的旨意把你带到了这里！当然了，像你这么伟大的人，绝不会允许这么不公平的事情发生！”{n}这个人脸上的肌肉抽搐着。看起来，他并不怎么习惯于拍人马屁。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, estoy seguro de que ha sido la providencia del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} lo que {mf|le|la} ha traído aquí! ¡No me cabe duda de que una persona tan venerada como usted no permitirá que se produzca una injusticia tan terrible!». {n}El hombre hace una mueca. Parece que no le resulta fácil adular a alguien.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, estoy seguro de que ha sido la providencia del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} lo que {mf|le|la} ha traído aquí! ¡No me cabe duda de que una persona tan venerada como usted no permitirá que se produzca una injusticia tan terrible!». {n}El hombre hace una mueca. Parece que no le resulta fácil adular a alguien.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、あんたがここに来るとは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の導きに違いない！あんたほど立派な人なら、どんな不正義も見逃さないだろうな！」{n}男は不機嫌になった。へりくだることに慣れていないらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あんたがここに来るとは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の導きに違いない！あんたほど立派な人なら、どんな不正義も見逃さないだろうな！」{n}男は不機嫌になった。へりくだることに慣れていないらしい。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es muss die Vorsehung des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} gewesen sein, die Euch hergeführt hat! Eine Persönlichkeit wir Ihr wird sicher nicht zulassen, dass ein großes Unrecht geschieht!" {n}Der Mann verzieht das Gesicht – Unterwürfigkeit scheint ihm schwerzufallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es muss die Vorsehung des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} gewesen sein, die Euch hergeführt hat! Eine Persönlichkeit wir Ihr wird sicher nicht zulassen, dass ein großes Unrecht geschieht!" {n}Der Mann verzieht das Gesicht – Unterwürfigkeit scheint ihm schwerzufallen.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, c'est certainement l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} qui vous envoie ! {mf|Un homme|Une femme} de votre stature doit bien pouvoir faire quelque chose contre une telle injustice ! » {n}L'homme affiche une étrange grimace. L'obséquiosité ne lui est apparemment pas naturelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, c'est certainement l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} qui vous envoie ! {mf|Un homme|Une femme} de votre stature doit bien pouvoir faire quelque chose contre une telle injustice ! » {n}L'homme affiche une étrange grimace. L'obséquiosité ne lui est apparemment pas naturelle.{/n}

languages.text: "Sizi bize {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} takdiri getirmiş olmalı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizin gibi yüce bir şahsiyet böyle bir adaletsizliğe göz yumamazdı tabii!" {n}Adam yüzünü buruşturuyor. Yaltaklanmaya pek alışkın değil gibi gözüküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it must have been the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s providence that brought you here! Surely a figure as great as yourself won't allow for a terrible injustice to happen!" {n}The man grimaces — it appears that obsequiousness does not come easily to him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sizi buraya getiren şey, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un takdiri olmalı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizin gibi yüce biri böyle bir adaletsizliğe göz yumamazdı tabii!" {n}Adam yüzünü buruşturuyor. Dalkavukluk yapmaya pek alışkın değil gibi gözüküyor.{/n}
